page.title: 04Transport in King's Lynn
page.content: {Roads}A1078 bypassing North Lynn,passing through the docks area,past the North Lynn Industrial estate to South Wootton.This is the main route into the docks and industrial area.This road is single carriageway and allows few opportunities for overtaking.Minor roads throughout the rest of the area.Some of the roads in South Wootton have been upgraded to provide footpaths. {Buses}North Lynn circular 484,which runs very thirty minutes weekdays 7.15am. to 21.48pm.There are five services on Sundays. SouthWootton-four services run on different routes, every hour weekdays, from King's Lynn to Hunstanton.Buses are rarely used by people in our area.
